Package bll

Interface IDeliveryServiceProcessing

All Known Implementing Classes:
DeliveryService
public interface IDeliveryServiceProcessing
interface of functionalities for the administrator and for the client

  • Method Details

    • importProducts

      void importProducts()
      method to import the items from the .csv file
      Post:,
      !menu.isEmpty()

    • importData

      void importData()
      method to import the data from file at each run of the application
      Post:,
      !menu.isEmpty() && !users.isEmpty() && !ids.isEmpty() && !orders.isEmpty()

    • addProduct

      void addProduct​(MenuItem menuItem)
      method that adds new product to list of products
      Parameters:
      menuItem - item to be inserted in the list of products
      Pre:,
      !menuItem.getName().isEmpty() && menuItem.getRating() > 0 && menuItem.getCalories() >0 && menuItem.getProteins() >0 && menuItem.getFat() > 0 && menuItem.getSodium() > 0 && menuItem.getPrice() > 0, menu.stream().noneMatch(menuItem1 -> menuItem1.getName().equals(menuItem.getName()))
      Post:,
      wasAdded(menuItem);

    • addCompositeProduct

      void addCompositeProduct​(java.lang.String name, java.util.List<MenuItem> components)
      method that adds new menu to the list of MenuItems
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the product to insert
      components - the components of the product to insert
      Pre:,
      !components.isEmpty(), !name.isEmpty(), menu.stream().noneMatch(m -> m.getName().equals(name))
      Post:,
      newCompositeProduct.getCalories() != 0 && newCompositeProduct.getFat() != 0 && newCompositeProduct.getPrice() != 0 && newCompositeProduct.getRating() != 0 && newCompositeProduct.getProteins() != 0 && newCompositeProduct.getSodium() != 0, !newCompositeProduct.getItems().isEmpty(), wasAdded(newCompositeProduct)

    • deleteProduct

      void deleteProduct​(MenuItem menuItem)
      method that deletes the specified menuItem
      Parameters:
      menuItem - item to be deleted
      Pre:,
      menuItem !=null;, menu.stream().anyMatch(m->m.equals(menuItem))
      Post:,
      wasDeleted(menuItem)

    • updateProduct

      void updateProduct​(java.lang.String productToModify, MenuItem menuItem)
      method that updates the menuItem with the given name
      Parameters:
      productToModify - the name of the product to modify
      menuItem - a menuItem containing all the updated fields for the product to be modified
      Pre:,
      !productToModify.isBlank();, menuItem != null;, menu.stream().anyMatch(m -> m.getName().equals(productToModify))
      Post:,
      (menu.stream().anyMatch(m -> m.equals(menuItem)))

    • search

      java.util.List<MenuItem> search​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Double rating, java.lang.Integer calories, java.lang.Integer proteins, java.lang.Integer fat, java.lang.Integer sodium, java.lang.Integer price)
      method that searches for the menuItems that correspond to the specified criteria (if the name is "###" it means that the name is not needed if other fields are -1 it means that they are not needed)
      Parameters:
      name - of product
      rating - of product
      calories - of product
      proteins - of product
      fat - of product
      sodium - of product
      price - of product
      Returns:
      list of menuItems
      Pre:,
      name != null && rating != null && calories != null && proteins != null && fat != null && sodium != null && price != null;

    • addOrder

      void addOrder​(Order order, java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> items)
      method to add an order to the hashmap of orders
      Parameters:
      order - the order details of the new order that has to be added to the hashmap of orders
      items - the items from th order
      Pre:,
      order.getOrderDate() != null && order.getClientId() >0 && order.getOrderId() >0, !items.isEmpty()
      Post:,
      wasAddedHash(order)

    • timeIntervalReport

      void timeIntervalReport​(int minH, int maxH)
      method that generates the report about products orderd in a time interval
      Parameters:
      minH - minim hour
      maxH - maxim hour
      Pre:,
      minH >= 0 && maxH <= 24

    • favoriteProductsReport

      void favoriteProductsReport​(int times)
      method that generates the report about the products that have been ordered more than a number of time
      Parameters:
      times - the nr of time th product should have been ordered at least
      Pre:,
      times>0

    • clientsReport

      void clientsReport​(int value, int idCount)
      method generates report about the clients that have ordered more than idCount time an order with price > value
      Parameters:
      value - price of order
      idCount - number of times the client has ordered
      Pre:,
      idCount > 0 && value >0

    • productsInDay

      void productsInDay​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      method that generates report about products ordered in a day and the number of times they were ordered
      Parameters:
      date - the date in which the products were ordered
      Pre:,
      date.isBefore(LocalDate.now().plusDays(1))
